main event: A couple sighted a UFO hovering near their farm in Coudersport, Pennsylvania, on July 7, 1964.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 10-15 minutes,The UFO was approximately 80-100 feet long and 20-25 feet wide,It had a bright light underneath and smaller flashing lights along the sides,The sighting was also confirmed by other witnesses in the area,The object moved off to the northeast at a high rate of speed after hovering silently.
sighted object: a round, glowing object with a bluish-white light
witness description: a couple who were outside their farm
